review: wish it had more newer shows and movies
author: Brent Deckard

review: Love its availability, but hardly anything I enjoy is on it. I play Candy Crush and am a big Facebook user, and neither of them are available on Fire TV. Now, don't get me wrong---I love that it has Kindle Freetime and transfers between my other Amazon devices, but in order to get a higher rating, this product needs to have a much wider variety of FREE features as well as the most commonly used apps other companies have.
author: Anne Cover

review: Can't say more than what everyone else has said, we love it!  Didn't know our tv required a cable to connect it so wasn't able to enjoy it on Christmas  day but once we got the cable, its been fantastic.  I think Amazon oversold us on the number of movies we'd be able to watch though, as most are for rent, and not "free" and the movies that are free are not that great of a selection, yet.  Amazon charges $1 less than what we pay for movies on demand through our cable company.
author: BOOK REVIEW

review: I had an Apple TV, but got rid of it because it did not have an Amazon Prime app.  I like the features of the Amazon Fire TV with the voice search, but think the menu on the Apple TV is much easier to navigate.
